title: CYME 7.1

As part of the CYME 7 Series, this new version reiterates our commitment to constantly improve our software by offering a unique solution that combines a design centered on the needs of power engineers and leading-edge engineering software tools.

CYME 7.1 offers a wide range of enhanced capabilities, featuring new modules, new functionalities and extended configuration options including:

CYME 7.1 provides easier navigation through the one-line diagram with several improvements made to the softwareÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Explorer Bar where many tabs have been re-designed for greater flexibility and ease of use. Enhancements have also been made to the equipment libraries in order to facilitate the search of devices using the new group by keyword functionality and the embedded CYME libraries.

CYME 7.1 improves our offering in areas such as Volt/Var Management and Renewable Energies with the addition of key refinements to existing devices such as Shunt Capacitors and Inverter-Based Generators, along with the addition of new devices such as Centralized Capacitor Control Systems.

The combination of new analyses, user-driven functionalities and improvements makes CYME 7.1 an essential tool for all your power engineering studies
